moduleEnabled.name: Enable Module
moduleEnabled.hint: Enable or disable the GURPS Grapple Party module. When enabled, tokens will automatically scale and position when occupying the same hex.

yAdjustment.name: Vertical Adjustment (Deprecated)
yAdjustment.hint: This setting is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Vertical adjustment in pixels for token positioning (negative moves up, positive moves down)

maxIgnoredScale.name: Maximum Ignored Scale
maxIgnoredScale.hint: Tokens with scale larger than this value will be ignored by the module. Default: 1.5

pairScale.name: Paired Token Scale
pairScale.hint: Scale applied to tokens when multiple tokens occupy the same hex. Default: 0.4 (40% of normal size)

centerDistance.name: Center Distance
centerDistance.hint: How far to push tokens away from hex center when positioning (as fraction of grid size). Negative values pull toward center, positive push away. Default: -0.10

resetTokensMenu.name: Reset All Tokens
resetTokensMenu.hint: Utility to reset all tokens in the current scene to scale 1.0
resetTokensMenu.label: Open Token Reset Dialog

resetTokens.title: Reset All Tokens
resetTokens.warning: Warning: This will reset ALL tokens in the current scene to scale 1.0.
resetTokens.action1: Set all tokens to normal scale (1.0)
resetTokens.confirm: Are you sure you want to continue?

notifications.noScene: No active scene found. Please load a scene first.
notifications.noTokens: No tokens found in the current scene.
notifications.tokensReset: Successfully reset {count} tokens to normal scale.
notifications.resetError: Error occurred while resetting tokens. Check the console for details.
